pages.title: Trader Cores
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Trader Cores$() are used inside $(#033dfc)Vending Machines$(), allowing you to purchase $(#033dfc)limited trades$(), offered by $(#033dfc)Trader Cores$() using $(#033dfc)Vault Currency$().

pages.title: Other Uses
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Trader Cores$() are also used to create $(#033dfc)Eternals$() inside $(#033dfc)Cryo Chambers$().$(br2)If supplied a non-traded-with Core, the Cryo Chamber will return a $(#033dfc)Pandoras Box$()
Crafting the $(#033dfc)Vending Machine$().$(br2)Stores unlimited Trader cores of the same username.
Crafting the $(#033dfc)Advanced Vending Machine$().$(br2)Stores unlimited Trader cores any type.
